info.title: HubSpot Engagements V2
info.description: HubSpot Engagements is used for keeping your CRM records up-to-date on any interactions that take place outside of HubSpot. Activity reporting in the CRM also feeds off of this data.

post.description: Creates a batch of calls.
Retrieves a batch of calls by internal ID, or unique property values.
Updates a batch of calls.
Archives a batch of calls by ID.

get.description: Retrieves a page of calls. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.

post.description: Creates a call with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID.

get.description: Retrieves an object identified by 'callId'. 'callId' refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param.  Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.

delete.description: Moves an object identified by 'callId' to the recycling bin.

patch.description: Performs a partial update of an object identified by 'callId'. 'callId' refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

post.description: Merges two calls with same type.

Permanently deletes a call and all associated content to follow GDPR. Use optional property 'idProperty' set to 'email' to identify contact by email address. If email address is not found, the email address will be added to a blocklist and prevent it from being used in the future.
Retrieves a list of calls.
Creates a batch of emails.
Retrieves a batch of emails by internal ID, or unique property values.
Archives a batch of emails by ID.
Updates a batch of emails.

x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: This is a Copilot plugin for the HubSpot Engagements service.
